main event: On 6 March 1954, an unusual bright object was observed in the sky over Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, with various military personnel reporting multiple sightings.
interesting points: The object was described as diamond-shaped with a bright glow,It was observed for several minutes before disappearing,Several witnesses included police officer C.H. Maier and citizens,The object appeared to change in size and intensity as it moved,No physical evidence was recovered.
